title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles focusing on Cantonese natural language processing (NLP) and low-resource languages

author.literal: **"Cantonese Part-of-Speech Tagging on a New Corpus"** - Wong, P., & Chan, J.

title: This paper discusses the development of a new corpus for Cantonese and the challenges of part-of-speech tagging

author.literal: **"A Cantonese Speech Recognition System Based on Deep Learning"** - Lee, T., & Ching, P.

title: The authors present a speech recognition system tailored for Cantonese using deep learning techniques

author.literal: **"Challenges in Building Cantonese NLP Tools"** - Leung, H., & Wong, K.

title: This article outlines the specific challenges faced in developing NLP tools for Cantonese

author.literal: **"Cantonese Word Segmentation and POS Tagging Using Conditional Random Fields"** - Chan, S., & Lee, T.

title: The paper explores the use of conditional random fields for word segmentation and part-of-speech tagging in Cantonese
**"Low-Resource Language Processing: A Survey"**
A comprehensive survey of techniques and challenges in processing low-resource languages
**"Transfer Learning for Low-Resource Language Translation"**
This paper discusses the application of transfer learning to improve translation for low-resource languages
**"Cross-Lingual Word Embeddings for Low-Resource Languages"**
The authors investigate the use of cross-lingual word embeddings to enhance NLP tasks in low-resource languages
**"Neural Machine Translation for Low-Resource Languages"**
This article explores neural machine translation techniques specifically for low-resource languages
**"Data Augmentation for Low-Resource Language Processing"** - Fadaee
The paper presents methods for data augmentation to improve NLP performance in low-resource settings
**"Unsupervised Learning for Low-Resource Language Processing"**
The authors discuss unsupervised learning techniques for enhancing NLP tasks in low-resource languages

author.literal: **"Cantonese Named Entity Recognition Using BiLSTM-CRF"** - Lam, W., & Wong, P.

title: This paper presents a named entity recognition system for Cantonese using BiLSTM-CRF models
**"Building a Cantonese-English Parallel Corpus for Machine Translation"**
The authors describe the creation of a parallel corpus for Cantonese-English machine translation

author.literal: **"Cantonese Sentiment Analysis Using Deep Learning"** - Ng, K., & Chan, S.

title: This article explores sentiment analysis in Cantonese using deep learning techniques
**"Low-Resource Language Speech Recognition Using Multilingual Models"**
The paper discusses the use of multilingual models to improve speech recognition in low-resource languages

author.literal: **"Cantonese Text-to-Speech Synthesis Using WaveNet"** - Wong, K., & Lee, T.

title: The authors present a text-to-speech synthesis system for Cantonese using WaveNet
**"Zero-Shot Learning for Low-Resource Language Translation"**
This paper explores zero-shot learning techniques for translating low-resource languages
**"Cantonese Dependency Parsing with Neural Networks"**
The authors discuss the application of neural networks for dependency parsing in Cantonese
**"Improving Low-Resource Language Models with Multilingual Pretraining"**
This article investigates the benefits of multilingual pretraining for language models in low-resource settings
**"Cantonese Automatic Speech Recognition Using End-to-End Models"**
The paper presents an end-to-end approach to automatic speech recognition for Cantonese

author.literal: **"Low-Resource Language Processing with BERT"** - Devlin, J., & Chang, M.

title: The authors explore the application of BERT for improving NLP tasks in low-resource languages
These articles cover a range of topics from foundational challenges to advanced techniques in Cantonese NLP and low-resource language processing
